name: Warshmallows
description:
The Warshmallows is a multiplayer couch game that aims to bring back the fun of spending quality time with your family and friends while playing intense matches casually in front of your TV or screen.
In a very cute universe, you will have to be the last player standing. To do so, you‘ll take control of a Warshmallow, a tiny cute creature with abilities like triple jump, dash and slow the time to avoid bullets. Every match is an epic test of skills, speed, and reflex.
Inspired by countless couch games, we wanted to bring something competitive, creative, and fun to the table. The game is designed to be quick to play, fun to master: Easy controls to run small game sessions that can be less than 10 minutes and that will bring all the excitement of a fast-paced 2D arena shooter game.
The game is a premium game for PC and soon consoles and an option to play online in a massive multiplayer spirit.
Upcoming features :
Unique power per character, new weapons, celebration dances.
New modes, local and online.
More levels.
The possibility to customize your Warshmallow.
New graphic effects!
New soundtrack.
The possibility to share the best action on social outlets.
